prompt: A whimsical depiction of a Stellar Monarch known as the Nebula Envoy, floating peacefully in space. The character is adorned with flowing robes that appear to be made of stardust and nebulae. Smaller stars and cosmic dust swirl around the Monarch, casting gentle, colorful glows. The background is a serene cosmic scene filled with twinkling stars and distant galaxies. The art style is bright and ethereal, capturing the fantastical essence of the Celestial Empires.
